General_Description: '''Stone Cold''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''Travel southwest of [[Korinth]] in the [[Valley of Judgment]] to find a beautiful [[Cyclopean Head of Medusa|monster]]. You can find me on the tip of her tongue. Just be careful not to get swallowed by her gaze.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
